tools.name: ChatGPT
tools.description: General-purpose conversational AI for text generation, coding, and analysis.

tools.name: Midjourney
tools.description: AI image generation tool for creating artistic and realistic images.

tools.name: Copilot
tools.description: AI assistant for code completion and suggestions.

tools.name: Claude
tools.description: Advanced reasoning for complex analysis, coding, and high-accuracy text.

tools.name: Consensus
tools.description: Provides evidence-based answers extracted from peer-reviewed papers.

tools.name: Deepseek
tools.description: Specialised in advanced maths, logic, and technical reasoning.

tools.name: Gemini
tools.description: Multimodal AI assistance integrated across the Google Workspace ecosystem, capable of processing text, images, video, and audio.

tools.name: Grammarly
tools.description: Corrects grammar, tone, and professional clarity across all writing for a final polish.

tools.name: Manus
tools.description: Autonomous agent designed to handle complex, multi-step digital tasks with minimal guidance.

tools.name: NotebookLM
tools.description: Allows you to chat with and summarise your own uploaded documents and material.

tools.name: Qwen
tools.description: High-performance multilingual model for mathematical reasoning and technical tasks, specialised in Chinese-language context.

tools.name: Perplexity
tools.description: Searches the internet to provide direct answers with source citations.

tools.name: Meta AI
tools.description: Social assistant for chat, news, and image generation within Meta apps.

tools.name: Quillbot
tools.description: Paraphrases and rewrites text to improve fluency and change tone.

tools.name: Suno
tools.description: AI music generator that creates full songs (including lyrics and vocals) from simple text prompts.

tools.name: Turbo AI
tools.description: Converts lectures, videos, and PDFs into study notes and flashcards.

tools.name: Blackbox AI
tools.description: A coding assistant focused on rapid code generation, documentation, and answering technical questions directly in the IDE.

tools.name: Tutorly AI
tools.description: Provides students with homework, essay drafting, and step-by-step problem-solving.

tools.name: Lovable
tools.description: An AI app builder that generates real, editable code from natural language descriptions.

tools.name: Elicit
tools.description: Automates literature reviews and data extraction from academic documents.

tools.name: Cursor
tools.description: An AI-native code editor (forked from VS Code) that integrates LLMs directly into the coding workflow for refactoring and refinement.

tools.name: Lumen AI
tools.description: Converts text, blogs, and articles into social media marketing videos.

tools.name: Grok
tools.description: AI integrated into X (Twitter), featuring real-time access to social media trends and a witty, rebellious personality.
